biography.summary: Martin Heinrich is a United States Senator from New Mexico, serving since 2013. He previously represented New Mexico's 1st congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 2009 to 2013. He is a Democrat focused on energy development, national security, and infrastructure.

contact.office_address: 709 Hart Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510

policy_positions.stance: Supports renewable energy development and climate action.
Supports protections for preexisting conditions and bipartisan approaches.

timeline.event: Elected to the U.S. House of Representatives, representing New Mexico's 1st district; took office January 3, 2009.
Elected to the U.S. Senate; took office January 3, 2013.
